titleStmt.title: Samuel G. Suddarth, Receipt to John Haly
CWG13678

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 11; Bundles of AG & QMG Expenditures 1864-65; Bundle 3

body.p:
NO. 12.
The State of Kentucky,
To John Haly, Dr.
1864

row.cell: To one Bushel Basket $100 one sett of Castors 40¢ Nails 25¢
" Two Tables $7.00 one coffin lined $10.50. Lumber for Cubbard 90¢
" Lumber for Benches $2.40. Lumber for Bed & shelf $180
" Nails for Same $1.00 Thumb latch 50¢. Carpenter work $6.25
" 500 feet Lumber for stairway and platform @ 3¢
" Carpenter work and nails for same
" Nails and work for same $9.50. Breaking door in Brick. w $150
" Flooring at Head of stairway $1.50. Divisions $2.50
" alteration in wood house $3.75. Patent Leather $3.87
" one screw driver 35¢ one coffin lined and halling $1075
" one Door frame, Casing, and Door

body.p: I certify that the above account is correct and just, and that the articles were furnished as stated, and that they were necessary for the public service.

Wm H. Gardner
Surgeon in Charge Hospital
Quarter-Master Gen. of Ky.

Received at Frankfort, Kentucky, the 21st of March, 1864, of S. G. SUDDARTH, Quarter=Master General of the State of Kentucky, One hundred & Sixty two dollars and fifty cents, in full of the above account.
(DUPLICATE.)

15.
No 12.
No 49 Abstract. G
Jno Haly
Dollars 162 50/100
Paid March 21 1864.
